item.description: Hey Everyone...it's a holiday Monday and you know what that means! Holiday Mondays are potluck game nights at Bobbi's house. We'll start a little earlier so we have time for food and games. 6pm at Bobbi's in south Nashua (just a couple of miles from Borders). I'll send directions to the house the day before to everyone who RSVP'd "Yes."
item.why: You'll love it because you know you love playing board/card games and you love meeting new, exciting people.

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup
